title: Which changes increase HI from equilibrium mixture

content.prompt:
H2(g) + I2(g) ⇄ 2HI(g)             ΔH > 0

Which of the following changes to the equilibrium system represented above will increase the quantity of HI(g) in the equilibrium mixture?
I. Adding H2(g)
II. Increasing the temperature
III. Decreasing the pressure

skill.text: 6.D: Provide reasoning to justify a claim using chemical principles or laws, or using mathematical justification.
